item.title: PepsiCo Boosts Stake in Celsius
item.description: PepsiCo is upping its stake in Celsius to 11%. The move consolidates distribution for Celsius and give PepsiCo an energy boost, reports Bloomberg’s Crystal Tse. (Source: Bloomberg)
